props.block: Expands the button to 100% of available space.
props.contentClass: Applies a custom class to content wrapper.
props.disabled: Removes the ability to click or target the component.
props.href: Designates the component as anchor and applies the href attribute.
props.link: Removes `padding`/`height`/`border-radius` styles and align text left.
props.maxWidth: Sets the maximum width for the component.
props.minWidth: Sets the minimum width for the component. Default size has `128px` and **small** has `96px`.
props.outlined: Makes the background transparent and applies a thin border.
props.primary: Default style, used when not **text**, **outlined** and `false`.
props.replace: Setting **replace** prop will call `router.replace()` instead of `router.push()` when clicked, so the navigation will not leave a history record.
props.tag: Specify a custom tag used on the root element.
props.to: Denotes the target route of the link.
